css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-c5516f99-u{margin-right:0px;padding-top:30px;padding-right:35px;padding-bottom:35px;padding-left:35px;border-top-left-radius:30px;border-top-right-radius:30px;border-bottom-right-radius:30px;border-bottom-left-radius:30px;max-width:475px;min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);flex-direction:column;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-c5516f99-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-top-left-radius:30px;border-top-right-radius:30px;border-bottom-right-radius:30px;border-bottom-left-radius:30px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-c5516f99-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-5,255,255,255),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-c5516f99-u{padding-top:50px;padding-right:55px;padding-bottom:55px;padding-left:55px;max-width:690px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){body.maxi-blocks--active #group-maxi-c5516f99-u{padding-top:25px;padding-right:30px;padding-bottom:30px;padding-left:30px;}}
